methods.name: SetColorSlot
methods.comment: Sets the currently active color slot index for the gun

methods.name: Sever_SetColorSlot
methods.comment: Sets the currently active color slot index for the gun on the server

methods.name: GetMaxNumColorSlots
methods.comment: Gets the mac number of color slots

methods.name: SetPrimaryColorForSlot
methods.comment: Set the secondary color for a given slot

methods.name: Sever_SetPrimaryColorForSlot
methods.comment: Set the secondary color for a given slot on the server

methods.name: SetSecondaryColorForSlot
methods.comment: Set the secondary color for a given slot index

methods.name: Sever_SetSecondaryColorForSlot
methods.comment: Sets the primary color for a given slot index on the server

methods.name: GetPrimaryColorForSlot
methods.comment: Get the primary color for a given color slot index

methods.name: GetSecondaryColorForSlot
methods.comment: Get the secondary color for a given color slot index

methods.name: GetColorSlotIndex
methods.comment: Get the the currently active color slot index for the gun

methods.name: ToggleColorPickerUI
methods.comment: Opens the UI so that the player can select both colors

methods.name: OnTargetStateChanged
methods.comment: Opens the UI so that the player can select both colors

methods.name: ProcessInstantHit_Confirmed
methods.comment: continue processing the instant hit, as if it has been confirmed by the server

methods.name: OnSecondaryFirePressed
methods.comment: Called when we press secondary fire

properties.name: mPrimaryColor_DEPRECATED
properties.comment: [DEPRECATED] This will be the color used when shooting

properties.name: mSecondaryColor_DEPRECATED
properties.comment: [DEPRECATED] This will be the color used when shooting

properties.name: mRedundantTargetCrosshairColor
properties.comment: crosshair color used when aiming at a target that already have the same color slot as you are painting

properties.name: mRedundantTargetCrosshairTexture
properties.comment: crosshair texture used when aiming at a target that already have the same color slot as you are painting

properties.name: mNoTargetCrosshairColor
properties.comment: crosshair color used when aiming at a target too far away or not aiming at a target at all

properties.name: mNoTargetCrosshairTexture
properties.comment: crosshair texture used when aiming at a target too far away or not aiming at a target at all

properties.name: mNonColorableTargetCrosshairColor
properties.comment: crosshair color used when aiming at a target that can't be colored

properties.name: mNonColorableTargetCrosshairTexture
properties.comment: crosshair texture used when aiming at a target that can't be colored

properties.name: mValidTargetCrosshairTexture
properties.comment: crosshair texture used when aiming at a target isvalid

properties.name: mColorSlot
properties.comment:
This will be the color slot used when shooting
[DavalliusA:Fri/01-03-2019] don't use the first color as default, as it will make players maybe not notice when thye fire on a building already using the default color

properties.name: mCharOwner
properties.comment: [DavalliusA:Wed/20-03-2019] saved so we can easily handle outline stuff
